== Plan of the future releases ==

=== Introduction ===

Toshiro-IOC is ready to use in production. However there will be some features added in the future in order to make make the project more complete into real world applications. All of the future releases are planned to be interface compatible with the first released version (0.7)

=== Release plan ===

*0.8* 
  * more ASDocs comments
  * refactored internal structure
  * added puremvc (multicore) support

*0.9*
  * added support to multifile implementation

*1.0*
  * added support for dynamically adding new xml files with object definitions, which will help to integrate into multicore modules
